summary.Title: Bartender
summary.Presentation:
We at Mash Penthouse are looking for part timers bartenders and/or Bar runners looking at 3-4 shifts a week mainly weekends, with start in May. Trial Shifts before may.

Interested in being

WorkPlace.Name: Mash Penthouse
WorkPlace.Description:
Mash Steakhouse vil være anerkendt som et af de bedste steakhouses i Europa.
Det kræver høj kvalitet af råvarer, vin og service og en vilje til konstant at blive bedre, så vores gæster kan få en sublim oplevelse hos os.
Der er i alt 7 Mash restauranter i København, Århus, London og Hamborg.
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Mash Steakhouse har en ambition om at være et af de bedste steakhouses i Europa.
Det kræver råvarer, vin og service i særklasse, som vi konstant arbejder på at forbedre og raffinere.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We at Mash Penthouse are looking for part timers bartenders and/or Bar runners looking at 3-4 shifts a week mainly weekends, with start in May. Trial Shifts before may.

Interested in being part of a fun, dynamic, strong team, looking to further improve yourself? Do you want to want to join a great a work environment and a stunning view with that?

Experience is not a must but certainly a plus.

Do you want to want to join a great a work environment and a stunning view to add?

Get in touch trough the link below!

 

https://app.jobmatchprofile.com/pxh45t/copenhagen-concepts/2mrcpa/enu/bartender-til-mash-penthouse
